<tr>
  <td><h1>Description</h1><br/>
<b>Awesome Password Generator</b> is an easy to use application for quick generation of common passwords or Wi-Fi (WPA) passphrases. Just launch the generator and a shiny new password will be copied in the clipboard automatically!<br/>
<ul>
<li>Common, "general purpose" passwords for e-mail, online accounts and any desktop applications;</li>
<li>Wi-Fi (WPA) passphrases for your wireless devices;</li>
<li>Easy-to-type passwords like <tt>p-zuus2Dzx</tt>, not <tt>c]57%/z&Q9</tt>;</li>
<li>Passwords without confusing characters like 0 (zero) and O (oh);</li>
</ul>
For system administrators/IT-professionals is is also a powerfull tool for single or bulk password generation, with command line version for using from scripts (examples for batch and PowerShell included :).<br/>
<ul>
<li>GUI single/bulk password/wi-fi passphrase generation</li>
<li>Easy-to-type and Exclude confusing characters <a href=http://code.google.com/p/awesome-password-generator/wiki/Options>options</a></li>
<li>Quick and secure: <b>Copy to clipboard automatically</b> and <b>Clear clipboard on exit</b> options</li>
<li><a href=http://code.google.com/p/awesome-password-generator/wiki/ConsoleVersion>Console version</a>: <tt>apg-cl.exe</tt> has same functionality as GUI version. Do not mess with command line options - just run GUI, set up password length, quantity, charsets and other options as you wish, and click "Command line builder". Run <tt>apg-cl.exe</tt> with generated command line parameters!</li>
<li>Open Source: use PasswordGenerator class in your applications!</li>
</ul>
</td>
